zone.line: your compassion.
"I entreat you to call to your
remembrance our first happy life
on the shores of Loch Lomond. I had
arrived from a weary wandering of
sixteen years, during which, although
I gav^had gone through many dangers
and misfortunes, my affections had
been an entire blank. If I grieved it
was for your mother, if I loved it was
your image; only that these sole
emotions filled my heart in quietness.
â€“ it was never called The human
creatures around me excited in me
no sympathy and I therefore thought
that the mighty change that the
death of your mother had wrought in
me within me had rendered me cal
lous to any future impression. I saw
the lovely and I did not love, I ima
therefore that all warmth was extin
guished within me in my heart
gined
